channel.title: Help me please.. special bar in wildy skull place
channel.description: hmm.. i was wondering if i could put some sorta special bar in like.. the spot of the crossbone skull in my server, and like have it have a unique filler and such, and like above or below it have letters that change color when special is on. is it posible? if so can i do it the way i want or do i have it in a different spot or what?

item.title: Help me please.. special bar in wildy skull place
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

i cant get it clickable how should i make a case for it
i am totaly blank on this, here are my on off cases

  case 14655: //specialon
specOn = true;
break;
	  case 14656: //specialoff
specOn = false;
break;

interface number is 14654.
please if you can help me?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 01, 2007, 05:32:10 PM[/size][hr]please someone help me i really dont know how to get this interface to work. when i scroll over the on/off options i dont get that ok. ## thing :\ and i really dont know how to put it on the crossbone spot either :\

Read full topic

item.title: Help me please.. special bar in wildy skull place

item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

[quote=“hippie, post:12, topic:129271”]hmm ill look for different stoof

OO 14654. its a 3 option interface but, i can have the top option clicked for on, 2nd for off
and option 3 could be the spec bar… think its workabke?[/quote]

Nice find, now you gotta put it in the place of the skull, gl

item.title: Help me please.. special bar in wildy skull place
item.dc:creator: @mikescott mikescott
item.description:
@mikescott wrote:

[quote=“hippie, post:9, topic:129271”]ok i have interface 2459 i gues, its different, and it has 2 buttons, option 1 and option 2, would it work?

Change the trade button (on, friends, off) thats good isnt it? thats below the skull and x-bones.

good idea BUT it has three options, also thats client side isnt it?[/quote]

Ahh touché

item.title: Help me please.. special bar in wildy skull place
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

First you gotta find an interface with on and off buttons, and text above them so you can do the ||||| bit, then you have to make it appear where the skull and crossbones are.

Gl.

item.title: Help me please.. special bar in wildy skull place
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

i do have working special its jus for some reason the spec bar in the attack interface lags the hell outa my server if i have more then three :S
so i want one spec bar for all, in an easy to see place and not teh emote place

im just not 100% sure on how to code the bar thats all, and i need something to indicate that spec is on and off, you wouldnt happen to have the interface ID’s to help meh would you? also, i was wondering if i could have my wildy thing have something like…
|-----|
|____ | <-- x bones
|||||||| <-- Spec bar
ON OFF toggle under it
